row.process:
@echo off
!Check for command and script file path :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# NE "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4B_SSH_SCRIPT_FILE_PATH# NE "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : ENDIF :IF &COUNT# EQ 0 OR 2 : STOP MSG, 50, "Please provide either command or script file path" :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SSH.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RunCommandAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SSH.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN
!Append action specific inputs to java args : IF &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# <> "" ! Temprory File Name : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4B_SSH_COMMAND_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"command-&$RUNID#.txt") ! File content : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4B_SSH_COMMAND_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SSH.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE : PUBLISH &UC4B_SSH_COMMAND_FILE_PATH#,,"TASK" : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4B_SSH_SCRIPT_FILE_PATH# : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SSH.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -commandfilepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!SSH Timeout : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -sshtimeout &UC4RB_SSH_TIMEOUT#")
!Max output size : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -maxsize &UC4RB_SSH_OUTPUT_SIZE#")
!Output File Path : IF &UC4RB_SSH_OUTPUT_FILE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_SSH_OUTPUT_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SSH.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -outputfilepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
!Error File Path : IF &UC4RB_SSH_ERROR_FILE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_SSH_ERROR_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SSH.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -errfilepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Allocate TTY : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -tty &UC4RB_SSH_TTY#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# ! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RUN COMMAND ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RUN COMMAND ACTION FAILED ********" !------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SSH.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
